item.title: Upcoming: Camps, Communities & Events
item.description: We like to enable more camps around a lot of stuffs and connect with more communities. Following this idea to invite different camps plus communities, we are likely to learn more and its better for everyone here. Organizing Events/Workshops/Meetups to let people explore things at our base could be done too. Camps we might start : 1. HF StartUp Camp (using StartUp School online curriculum) 2. CodeCamp v2.0 (a month camp in Himalayas during summer) Communities across world : 1.

item.title: Survival Guide HF2019 : Must Read
item.description: Participation We really like active and engaging participants at the base and NO spectators here. HackerFarm is only functional because of the attendees. ▾ HackerFarm ▾ Study Camps ▾ Digital Nomads ▾ Events | Workshops Leave No Trace The farm is very raw natural space and we would always like to keep it the same way. So please make sure to keep the trash in the trash cans or take back what you bring here especially plastics etc.

item.title: A day & night at HackerFarm
item.description: Daily Routine 8 AM Yoga* 9 AM Breakfast 10 AM Study* 1 PM Lunch 2 PM Projects* 5 PM Games/Unicycle Kirtan 8 PM Dinner Yoga & Volunteering We expect all campers to participate in core community activities. Yoga happens weekdays (Mon to Fri) at 8 in morning and all people must attend. We follow slightly modified Ashtanga series with meditations/pranayamas for an hour.

item.title: Introduction to HackerFarm
item.description: HackerFarm is primarily a physical plus internet camping space and gets activated because of “curious and creative attendees”. The basic temporary setups like living building, kitchen, bathroom and hi-speed net connection are arranged to make sure that we remain connected with the global online sphere while spending our time here. Hackers’Castle The castle is a raised space at the farm (built using pallet racks) and campers pitch their tents on its floors.

item.title: Apply
item.description: We are here to assist you Are you looking to join us as a learner? You can apply under camps mentioned in the form or on site. Loading...

item.title: FAQ
item.description: We believe that the Internet Technology has been massively transforming lives of people on this planet. Be it learning, working, solving real-life challenges etc. With abundance of resources available online, people need access to low-cost natural space to upskill and to be a part of this internet revolution, also influence the economy and make a living out of it. HackerFarm serves itself as a physical space and it’s functional because of people.

item.title: STUDY CAMPS
item.description: There is more to life than programming and much in technology than just online classes. Study Camp is the core camp at HackerFarm and it exists to prepare people to learn skills & work in the technology industry. People take online classes, do prep work for Coding Bootcamps, or go throuh remote coding bootcamp curriculum. First, we do yoga.. then we do the things. →STUDY GROUPS WITH PEERS 1.
